mapper.select: select t3.*, t4.apartment_id from (select t1.id, t1.name , t1.unit, t2.name as feeKeyName,t2.id as feeKeyId from fee_value t1 left join fee_key t2 on (t1.fee_key_id = t2.id) where (t1.is_deleted = 0) and (t2.is_deleted = 0)) t3 left join apartment_fee_value t4 on t4.fee_value_id = t3.id where t4.is_deleted = 0 and apartment_id = #{id}
